title: Pattern Matching
statement:
# Pattern Matching

Find all occurrences of a pattern in a text.

## Problem Description

Given a text string and a pattern, find all starting indices (0-based) where the pattern occurs.

## Input Format

First line: the text string
Second line: the pattern string

## Output Format

Space-separated starting indices, or `NOT FOUND` if pattern doesn't exist.

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ pattern length ≤ text length ≤ 10^5
